body_html: I have also met this issue when I use nn.CrossEntropyLoss. You should also put the weight vector in GPU and wrap it with Variable. But I think the error message is good to know what is wrong.
body_text: I have also met this issue when I use nn.CrossEntropyLoss. You should also put the weight vector in GPU and wrap it with Variable. But I think the error message is good to know what is wrong.
body: I have also met this issue when I use `nn.CrossEntropyLoss`. You should also put the weight vector in GPU and wrap it with Variable. But I think the error message is good to know what is wrong.
